review-request.subject: How Was Your Recent Purchase from Zada?
review-request.title: We'd Love Your Feedback!
review-request.message: Thank you for your recent purchase from Zada. We hope you're enjoying your new items!
review-request.reviewPrompt: Would you mind taking a moment to share your thoughts? Your feedback helps other shoppers make informed decisions and helps us improve our products and services.
review-request.incentive: As a thank you for your review, we'll send you a {{discountAmount}} discount code for your next purchase!
review-request.noReviewMessage: If you prefer not to leave a review at this time, no problem! We hope you enjoy your purchase.
